verses.verse: Likewise <S%H2063><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the trespass <S%H817><s%> offering: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>

In the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> they kill <S%H7819><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering shall they kill <S%H7819><s%> the trespass <S%H817><s%> offering: and the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof shall he sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> of it all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof; the rump, <S%H451><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%>

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on <S%H5921><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> is by the flanks, <S%H3689><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> that is above <S%H5921><s%> the liver, <S%H3516><s%> with the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> it shall he take <S%H5493><s%> away:
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%> for an offering made by fire to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it is a trespass <S%H817><s%> offering.

Every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> among the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> thereof: it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%> it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>

As the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering is, so is the trespass <S%H817><s%> offering: there is one <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> for them: the priest <S%H3548><s%> that makes atonement <S%H3722><s%> therewith shall have <S%H1961><s%> it.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> that offers <S%H7126><s%> any man's <S%H376><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, even the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> to himself the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering which <S%H834><s%> he has offered. <S%H7126><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> that is baked <S%H644><s%> in the oven, <S%H8574><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is dressed <S%H6213><s%> in the frying pan, <S%H4802><s%> and in the pan, <S%H4227><s%> shall be the priest's <S%H3548><s%> that offers <S%H7126><s%> it.

And every <S%H3605><s%> meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and dry, <S%H2720><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> have, <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H376><s%> as much as another. <S%H251><s%>
And this <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, which <S%H834><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> he offer <S%H7126><s%> it for a thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> with the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and cakes <S%H2471><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> of fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> fried. <S%H7246><s%>

Besides <S%H5921><s%> the cakes, <S%H2471><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> for his offering <S%H7133><s%> leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> with the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> of his peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.

And of it he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> one <S%H259><s%> out of the whole <S%H3605><s%> oblation <S%H7133><s%> for an heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be the priest's <S%H3548><s%> that sprinkles <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.

And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings for thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> the same day <S%H3119><s%> that it is offered; <S%H7133><s%> he shall not leave <S%H5117><s%> any of it until <S%H5704><s%> the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his offering <S%H7133><s%> be a vow, <S%H5088><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a voluntary <S%H5071><s%> offering, it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> the same day <S%H3119><s%> that he offers <S%H7126><s%> his sacrifice: <S%H2077><s%> and on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> also the remainder <S%H3498><s%> of it shall be eaten: <S%H398><s%>
But the remainder <S%H3498><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> any of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings be eaten <S%H398><s%> at all on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3119><s%> it shall not be accepted, <S%H7521><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall it be imputed <S%H2803><s%> to him that offers <S%H7126><s%> it: it shall be an abomination, <S%H6292><s%> and the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eats <S%H398><s%> of it shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> that touches <S%H5060><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing shall not be eaten; <S%H398><s%> it shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> and as for the flesh, <S%H1320><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that be clean <S%H2889><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> thereof.

But the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eats <S%H398><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, that pertain to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> having his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> on him, even that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from his people. <S%H5971><s%>

Moreover the soul <S%H5315><s%> that shall touch <S%H5060><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing, as the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> or <S%H176><s%> any unclean <S%H2931><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> or <S%H176><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> abominable <S%H8263><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing, and eat <S%H398><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, which <S%H834><s%> pertain to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from his people. <S%H5971><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> You shall eat <S%H398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> manner of fat, <S%H2459><s%> of ox, <S%H7794><s%> or of sheep, <S%H3775><s%> or of goat. <S%H5795><s%>

And the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the beast <S%H5038><s%> that dies <S%H5038><s%> of itself, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> of that which is torn <S%H2966><s%> with beasts, <S%H2966><s%> may be used <S%H6213><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> other use: <S%H4399><s%> but you shall in no <S%H3808><s%> wise eat <S%H398><s%> of it.

For whoever <S%H3605><s%> eats <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the beast, <S%H929><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> men offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eats <S%H398><s%> it shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from his people. <S%H5971><s%>
Moreover you shall eat <S%H398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> manner of blood, <S%H1818><s%> whether it be of fowl <S%H5775><s%> or of beast, <S%H929><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> of your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

Whatever <S%H3605><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> it be that eats <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> manner of blood, <S%H1818><s%> even that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from his people. <S%H5971><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> He that offers <S%H7126><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.

His own hands <S%H3027><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> the offerings of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire, the fat <S%H2459><s%> with the breast, <S%H2373><s%> it shall he bring, <S%H935><s%> that the breast <S%H2373><s%> may be waved <S%H5130><s%> for a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> on the altar: <S%H4196><s%> but the breast <S%H2373><s%> shall be Aaron's <S%H175><s%> and his sons'. <S%H1121><s%>

And the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> shall you give <S%H5414><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> for an heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of your peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.

He among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> that offers <S%H7126><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, and the fat, <S%H2459><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> for his part. <S%H4490><s%>

For the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and the heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> have I taken <S%H3947><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from off the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of their peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, and have given <S%H5414><s%> them to Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> from among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the portion of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> out of the offerings of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire, in the day <S%H3119><s%> when he presented <S%H7126><s%> them to minister to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the priest's <S%H3547><s%> office;

Which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be given <S%H5414><s%> them of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> in the day <S%H3119><s%> that he anointed <S%H4886><s%> them, by a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> of the meat offering, and of the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and of the trespass <S%H817><s%> offering, and of the consecrations, <S%H4394><s%> and of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings;

Which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> in the day <S%H3119><s%> that he commanded <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> their oblations <S%H7133><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>
